topics.body:
basically, after we were dropped near a store and we had dinner, we decided to make a call...

but WHO-MOTHERFUCKING DICKHEAD-TO-ANAL-BANGING-OPS none of us had cellphones cause we are dumbasses.

so we had to make calls from public cellphones...

BUT WHOOPS I DIDINT HAD COINS SO I COULDNT CALL HOME

but wait my friend is calling "his home" (i hope) so maybe his mom will tell my mom? ok problem solved.

now we needed to go to the shopping mall next, however, we were suppose to take a bus called "metrolinea" that takes us directly to it faster, but our cards werent charged, and there was no place to charge them nearby, so after the bus came we couldnt get in, so we waited about an hour until we saw a bus with the name of the shopping mall in it "caracoli" so we got up in it.

however, after the bus did a 1 hour ride it dropped us off in some strange neighborhood, and told us it was the end of the line, well "gee wees" now we are fucked up for good, stranded in some neighborhood in the devils anus for all we know, we had to walk for 30 mins to find a cab to take us, and after that i had to retire money and get it to him.

SO THERE WE ARE, IN THE SHOPPING MALL, SO WE SHOP AND GO TO WATCH A MOVIE.

then after we leave the movies we try to find a watch since, of course none of us had cellphones or watched

11:50 PM

well GEE MOTHERFUCKING WEEZ BATMAN WE ARE NOW FUCKED UP FOR GOOD NOW THAT WE ARE FUCKING LATE AS FUCK TO OUR HOMES.

and since the ride back isnt just 5 minutes, we basically arrived at 12:30 am.

TO FIND MY MOTHER CRYING, TELLING ME SHE WAS BORDERLINE TO FILLING MY PAPERS FOR MISSING.

goddamn i hate this day
